title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2830.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2830.1 - Purpose

State Regulations
(a) The purpose of
the Rural Area Revitalization Projects Program is to assist the efforts of
eligible not-for-profit, local community-based organizations in housing
preservation and community renewal activities in the rural areas of the State
by providing funding for a portion of the costs of rural area revitalization
projects and to encourage community preservation and improvement in such
areas. (b) The regulations
contained herein are applicable for defining eligible applicants and projects, selection criteria and contract performance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2830.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
